name: tm45
effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Thunder Wave)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Makes it tough to attack a foe of the opposite gender.
flavor_text.emerald: Makes it tough to attack a foe of the opposite gender.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: If it is the other gender, the foe is made infatuated and unlikely to attack.
